definition: To deceive or cheat someone by acting dishonestly, typically involving breaking trust or manipulating situations for personal gain. This word is commonly used to describe actions that involve trickery, fraud, or betrayal.

examples.german: Er hat mich um viel Geld betrogen.
examples.english: He cheated me out of a lot of money.

examples.german: Sie betrügt ihren Ehemann mit einem anderen Mann.
examples.english: She is cheating on her husband with another man.

examples.german: Der Spieler wurde beim Pokerspiel betrogen.
examples.english: The player was cheated in the poker game.

examples.german: Du kannst mir nicht mehr vertrauen, weil du mich betrogen hast.
examples.english: You can't trust me anymore because you betrayed me.
